message.content: {"id": "50793", "title": "Bug 50793 - Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch", "description": "When invoking the dispatch() method of AsyncContext in a ServletRequestListener, the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest is REQUEST instead of ASYNC.", "OB": "The expected behavior is that the DispatcherType should match the value returned in the filter/servlet.", "EB": "When the actual servlet is invoked, the type is correctly set to ASYNC. If the listener is intended to be invoked for each dispatch, then the DispatcherType should match the value returned in the filter/servlet.", "SR": "To reproduce this issue, define a ServletRequestListener and invoke the AsyncContext.dispatch() method. After the invocation, check the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest and observe that it is REQUEST instead of ASYNC."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '50793', 'title': 'Bug 50793Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch', 'description': 'Bug 50793Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch ', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'When the actual servlet is invoked, the type is correctly set to ASYNC.If the listener is intended to be invoked for each dispatch, then the DispatcherType should match the value returned in the filter/servlet. ', 'SR': 'If a ServletRequestListener is defined, when is invoked after a call to AsyncContextdispatch() the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest is REQUEST rather than ASYNC. '}
